statements: UPDATE inventory_monitoring SET current_inventory = 50, reorder_level = 10 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_monitoring SET product_name = 'New Product Name', supplier_name = 'New Supplier Name' WHERE supplier_id = 2;
UPDATE inventory_monitoring SET current_inventory = current_inventory + 10 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE inventory_monitoring SET supplier_name = 'New Supplier', reorder_level = 50 WHERE product_id = 102;
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_person='John Doe', email='johndoe@example.com' WHERE supplier_id=1;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity=100, reorder_level=20 WHERE item_id=101;
UPDATE suppliers SET phone_number='123-456-7890', email='new_email@example.com', contact_person='John Doe' WHERE supplier_id=1;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity=100, reorder_quantity=20, reorder_level=5 WHERE item_id=100;
UPDATE SupplierData SET quantity = 50, price = 25.99 WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE InternalInventory SET current_quantity = 100, last_replenishment_date = '2022-05-20' WHERE product_id = 10;
UPDATE SupplierData SET price = price * 1.1, quantity = quantity - 10 WHERE supplier_id = 101
UPDATE InternalInventory SET current_quantity = current_quantity + 20, last_replenishment_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE inventory_id = 201
UPDATE suppliers SET supplier_name = 'ABC Supplies' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET product_price = 25.99 WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE suppliers SET supplier_name = 'Updated Supplier Name', supplier_email = 'updated@email.com' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET product_price = 99.99, product_name = 'Updated Product Name' WHERE product_id = 100;
UPDATE Suppliers SET supplier_name='New Supplier Name' WHERE supplier_id=1;
UPDATE Products SET product_price=25.99 WHERE product_id=2;
UPDATE Suppliers SET supplier_name = 'Updated Supplier Name' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE Products SET product_price = 49.99, supplier_id = 2 WHERE product_id = 101;
